root: ^A bit more garlic... and... Ark Ark, too much garlic!
^Mate what the hell! I went to get butter and you spoiled me steak recipe!
^Just... Let me adjust the spices, ya know you can just ask me to show ya how to cook.
^I... fine... next time teach me how I can help you cook.
^Well first ya need to learn to mix flavours together, fish and apples are a basic mix that I can teach ya.
^Ah ah no! Spices are the most complex things in cooking, how much and what you add is completely different for any recipe and personal taste.
^Don't give me those eyes Makra... Alright let's start from the top, get me some fish and apples from our stock... we'll cook something good!
^Don't mention it mate. But trust me if ya want to learn from me, you'll sweat and cry! Mostly from the onions and heat. Ah ah ah!
^I'm ready for that... I want to help more ( I want to learn with you more Willow)
